dmca.title: copyright infringment
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

 

________________________________

From: Danny Greer - CPi [mailto:danny@cpi-syndication.com] 
Sent: Friday, March 09, 2007 3:58 PM
To: zzzzzz
Subject: FW: copyright infringment
Importance: High

 

 

 

From: Danny Greer - CPi 
Sent: Friday, March 09, 2007 4:54 PM
To: 'webmaster@jdmorgan.net'
Cc: 'legal@cpi-ny.com'; 'abuse@theplanet.com'
Subject: copyright infringment
Importance: High

 

Dear Kristina,

  

You have images of Jeffrey Dean Morgan by Melanie Dunea published on
your website at:

 

http://www.jdmorgan.net/gallery/details.php?image_id=5533

http://www.jdmorgan.net/gallery/details.php?image_id=5534&sessionid=dc0c
bd18241be9fc30e3b5e5db28d94a&sessionid=dc0cbd18241be9fc30e3b5e5db28d94a

http://www.jdmorgan.net/gallery/details.php?image_id=5535

http://www.jdmorgan.net/gallery/details.php?image_id=5536

 

  

This is in direct violation of the DMCA. To avoid any possible legal
action, please remove these images from your website immediately.
Please tell me where you obtained these images and permission to publish
them.  Your website claims copyright belongs to "Content (c)
jdmorgan.net"

  

I look forward to hearing from you immediately.

 

I have copied your web host on this email also, if you do not comply by
removing the images immediately, your host will need to remove the
images for you or they will also be in breach of the DMCA and open to
possible legal action.

  

Sincerely,

  

Danny Greer

Creative Photographers inc.

Direct Tel: (212) 500-0913
